clauses.title: The service can delete specific content without reason and may do it without prior notice
clauses.description: This service can delete specific content. Usually they will claim they reserve the right to do it at their sole discretion, which is legalese for saying they won't give a specific reason. If the terms say they will not notify you, it shall be included in the quote but if it does not explicitly say they will give you a notice, it can be reasonably inferred that they can do it without telling you.
clauses.clause_text: NBCUniversal may, in its sole discretion, terminate your password, account (or any part thereof) or use of the online services, or remove and discard any User Content or information stored, sent, or received via the online services without prior notice and for any reason or no reason

case.text: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice

clauses.title: This service still tracks you even if you opted out from tracking
clauses.description: Users can’t fully opt out of tracking technologies used for non essential purposes such as advertising, marketing or analytics. The user may be asked for consent for installing some tracking technologies on the device, and even if all are rejected the service will still track its visitors and ignore the choice.This case doesn’t apply to functional cookies that are necessary to provide the services.
clauses.clause_text:

case.text: This service still tracks you even if you opted out from tracking

clauses.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data
clauses.description: Location-based information is collected and may be used and/or shared with third parties for purposes not directly related to the services provided (i.e. the Service doesn't rely on the use or share of location data to function properly).
clauses.clause_text:
• Provide the NBCUniversal Services
  • Personalize your experience
  • Provide seamless experience across platforms and devices
  • Protect our users, Services and properties
  • Market and Advertise for third parties

case.text: This service may collect, use, and share location data

clauses.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for purposes including advertising
clauses.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.
clauses.clause_text: Ad Selection and Delivery Cookies: These Cookies are used to collect data about your browsing habits, your use of the Services, your preferences, and your interaction with advertisements across platforms and devices for the purpose of delivering interest-based advertising content on the Services and on third-party sites. Third-party sites and services also use interest-based Advertising Cookies to deliver content, including advertisements relevant to your interests on the Services and third-party services.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

clauses.title: This service can share your personal information with third parties
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties nonessential to the service’s operation. This could be a business partner that receives your data to provide targeted advertisements.
clauses.clause_text:
We may share information about how you use the NBCUniversal Services and interact with content or ads to better tailor services, products, marketing and advertising on our Services and on third-party platforms.
To enable these purposes, we may share certain demographics information, user-generated content, device information and identifiers, connection and usage data, geolocation data, public and commercial information, and social media information.

case.text: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation

clauses.title: The service collects many different types of personal data
clauses.description: The service collects different kinds of personal data, such as name, demographic information, postal address, biometric data, device information, IDs, contacts, call logs...
clauses.clause_text:
Identification and demographics

For example: date of birth, gender, nationality, ethnicity, interests, lifestyle information, photos, social media credentials, including identification information about friends, contacts or referrals you provide.

case.text: Many different types of personal data are collected

clauses.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason
clauses.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.
clauses.clause_text: We may terminate your account, password or access in our sole discretion at any time and without prior notice.

case.text: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason

clauses.title: The copyright license maintained by the service over user data and/or content is broader than necessary.
clauses.clause_text: You grant us a broad license to content you post on our online services and bear all responsibility for all such content.

case.text: The copyright license maintained by the service over your data and/or content is broader than necessary.

clauses.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes
clauses.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.
clauses.clause_text: Send you marketing communications

case.text: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes

clauses.title: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes
clauses.description: This service forces users to use their own contracted arbitrator and forces users to waive their rights to jury trial.
clauses.clause_text: Binding Arbitration of All Disputes.

case.text: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes

clauses.title: The service uses social media cookies/pixels
clauses.description: These types of cookies/pixels send information to social media sites when you interact with the service.
clauses.clause_text: These Cookies are set by social media platforms on the Services to enable you to share content with your friends and networks. Social media platforms have the ability to track your online activity outside of the Services. This may impact the content and messages you see on other services you visit.

case.text: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels

clauses.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.
clauses.clause_text: Like many companies, we use cookies (small text files placed on your computer or device) and other tracking technologies on the Services (referred to together from this point forward as “Cookies”, unless otherwise stated), including HTTP cookies, HTML5 and Flash local storage/flash cookies, web beacons/GIFs, embedded scripts, ETags/cache browsers, and software development kits.

case.text: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

clauses.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.
clauses.clause_text: In the event that NBCUniversal or any NBCUniversal Affiliate is involved in a merger, acquisition, transfer of control, bankruptcy, reorganization or sale of assets, or diligence associated with such matters, we may sell or transfer the information described in this Privacy Policy as part of that transaction.

case.text: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

clauses.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
clauses.description: If the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they may not inform/notify the user while complying with the request.
clauses.clause_text: We share any of the categories of information we collect, as appropriate, with these third parties in order to: protect and enforce the legal rights, privacy, and safety of ourselves and our visitors. protect against possible fraud or other illegal activity. respond to requests from government and other authorities. and otherwise comply with legal process.

case.text: Your personal data may be disclosed to comply with government requests without notice to you

clauses.title: You waive your right to a class action.
clauses.description: The right to be represented in a class action (or representative action) exists in the US and some European countries. It allows people who have been similarly injured by the same accused to take legal action by a single lawsuit instead of individually. Some Terms of Service try to limit that right. By agreeing to them, you could waive (= renounce to) your right to a class action, which might reduce your chances to be successful in a case.
clauses.clause_text: You agree to arbitrate and waive jury trial and class actions.

case.text: You waive your right to a class action.

clauses.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.
clauses.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesn’t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.
clauses.clause_text: THAT YOUR USE OF THE SERVICE AFTER SUCH NOTICE CONSTITUTES YOUR GOING FORWARD AGREEMENT TO THE OTHER TERMS FOR YOUR NEW USE AND TRANSACTIONS.

case.text: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.

clauses.title: This service receives your percise location through GPS coordinates
clauses.description: Unless the service relies on Geo Location, this case is to be assigned to points that don't need your GPS coordinates to function properly.
clauses.clause_text:
Geolocation

For example: city, state and ZIP code associated with your IP address or derived through Wi-Fi triangulation.

case.text: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates

clauses.title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising
clauses.description: Your Personal Information is traded and shared with advertising companies to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites. Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile.
clauses.clause_text: Information collected via third-party cookies may be combined with personal data to target advertising.

case.text: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising

clauses.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.
clauses.clause_text:
We may share your information with:

  • Related Companies: NBCUniversal Affiliates, such as Sky, as well as our parent company Comcast Corporation and its affiliate, Comcast Cable, to help better tailor services, products, marketing, and advertising to you and to other existing and potential customers.

case.text: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

clauses.title: The service uses your personal data for advertising
clauses.description: Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites.
clauses.clause_text: Market and advertise for third parties

case.text: Your personal data is used for advertising

clauses.title: Your biometric data is collected
clauses.description: This service can collect or use your biometric data. This includes but is not limited to facial recognition, fingerprints, and iris scans. Although this feature can sometimes be convenient to the user, providing this type of information to the service could open your personal data to being sold or stolen.
clauses.clause_text:
Biometric identifiers

For example: facial scans or fingerprints we collect at some of our theme parks, studios, or our offices.

case.text: Your biometric data is collected

clauses.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics
clauses.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.
clauses.clause_text: We and our third-party vendors use these Cookies to perform analytics, so we can improve the content and user experience, develop new products and services, and for statistical purposes.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

clauses.title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication
clauses.description: The service tracks the user count or some actions of the user; this is usually used for statistics. For example, emails sent by a service can contain a pixel tag, which is a small, clear image that can tell them whether or not you have opened an email and what your IP address is.
clauses.clause_text:
Connection and Usage

For example: domain names, browsing activity, scrolling and keystroke activity, advertisements viewed, forms or fields you complete or partially complete, search terms, whether you open an email

case.text: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication

clauses.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text:
Depending on where you live, you may have certain rights with respect to your information. For example, under local laws, including in the European Union, you may be able to ask us to:

  • provide access to certain information we hold about you, in some cases in a portable format, if technically feasible
  • update or correct your information
  • delete certain information
  • restrict the use of your information

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.
clauses.clause_text: <strong>Purposes of use

case.text: Information is provided about how your personal data is used

clauses.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.
clauses.clause_text: Categories of personal information we collect

case.text: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect

clauses.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising
clauses.description: The service employs your data to target ads to you, but you can opt-out of this interest-based advertising.
clauses.clause_text:
Most third-party advertisers offer a way to opt out of their interest-based advertising. For more information or to opt out of receiving interest-based advertising from participating third-party advertisers, depending on your country of residence, please visit:

  • Digital Advertising Alliance in the US
  • Digital Advertising Alliance of Canada
  • European Interactive Digital Advertising Alliance
  • Australian Digital Advertising Alliance

case.text: You can opt out of targeted advertising

clauses.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
clauses.clause_text:
You agree to defend, indemnify and hold harmless NBCUniversal, its affiliates and their respective directors, officers, employees and agents from and against any and all claims, demands, actions, suits or proceedings, as well as any and all losses, liabilities, damages, costs and expenses (including reasonable legal fees and costs) arising out of or accruing from (a) any breach of these terms, including any of the foregoing provisions, representations or warranties, and/or from your placement or transmission of any content onto NBCUniversal's servers, and/or from any and all use of your account.
(b) any material posted or otherwise provided by you (including without limitation User Content), or any other subscriber or user of your account that infringes any intellectual property right of any person or entity or defames any person or violates their rights of publicity or privacy.
(c) any misrepresentation made by you in connection with your use of the online services.
and (d) any breach of any of the representation, warranties or other terms or conditions relating to use of your User Content or the online services.

case.text: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: Effective date August 18, 2017

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
clauses.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.
clauses.clause_text: You can set your browser to block these Cookies, but some parts of the site may not function properly.

case.text: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

clauses.title: They may stop providing the service at any time
clauses.description: They may discontinue the services without prior notice, at any time, for any or no reason. They usually assume no liability for losses and damages resulting from this suspension.
clauses.clause_text: We may change or discontinue our online service in whole or in part.

case.text: They may stop providing the service at any time

clauses.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.
clauses.description: Users can't use the Service for commercial purposes (unless the Service consents): it is only for personal, individual purposes.
clauses.clause_text: Your use of the online services shall be limited solely to your personal and non-commercial use.

case.text: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.

clauses.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.
clauses.description: Users can't use the Service for commercial purposes (unless the Service consents): it is only for personal, individual purposes.
clauses.clause_text: We only grant you a limited revocable license to use the site or service for your own non-commercial use subject to rules and limitations.

case.text: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.

clauses.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
clauses.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.
clauses.clause_text: We disclaim warranties and provide the online services "As Is."

case.text: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

clauses.title: This service is only available to users over 13 years of age
clauses.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.
clauses.clause_text: The Site and online services are intended for use by users who are over the age of 13

case.text: This service is only available to users over a certain age

clauses.title: This service requires first-party cookies
clauses.description: First-party cookies only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.
clauses.clause_text:
First-party Cookies

First-party Cookies are placed by us (including through the use of third-party service providers) and are used to allow you to use the Services and their features and to assist in analytics activities.

case.text: First-party cookies are used

clauses.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
clauses.description: Your personal data is used for statistics in a de-identified/aggregated form (i.e. not directly linked to a unique identity) to analyse trends, for research and for analytics.
clauses.clause_text: We may aggregate or deidentify your information and may use, share, rent or sell aggregated or deidentified information for any purpose, and such information is not subject to this Privacy Policy.

case.text: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

clauses.title: This service collects your IP address, which can be used to view your approximate location
clauses.clause_text:
Device information and identifiers

For example: IP address, cookie IDs, browser type and language, operating system, platform type, device type, and advertising and app identifiers

case.text: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location

clauses.title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.
clauses.description: The Terms may be updated without prior notice, but users will be notified of the changes at the moment they will start applying.
clauses.clause_text: EACH TIME YOU SIGN IN TO OR OTHERWISE USE THE ONLINE SERVICES YOU ARE ENTERING INTO A NEW AGREEMENT WITH US ON THE THEN APPLICABLE TERMS AND CONDITIONS AND YOU AGREE THAT WE MAY NOTIFY YOU OF OTHER TERMS BY POSTING THEM ON THE SITE OR ONLINE SERVICES (OR IN ANY OTHER REASONABLE MANNER OF NOTICE WHICH WE ELECT),

case.text: The terms may be changed at any time, but you will receive notification of the changes
